welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lemont, a charming city known for its historic downtown, scenic parks, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that Lemont has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and shipping operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Used for Delta Air Lines, Delta Connection, and Volaris flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Used for AirTran Airways and Frontier Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. Premium WiFi options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport, catering to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport. Password can be obtained at the information desk.
